divs: sighting detailsi was in the field directly accross from [address removed\cms\tg], next to route 34. i was walking home from [name deleted cms\tg] house adjacent to the field. while walking toward the house i noticed it got very bright and there was a super bright yellow\white light over our house. it was more oblong than disk but not very high (maybe as tall as the single story home). there is no definite shape. i can still see it in my mind. i stopped and just stared at it for an unknown period of time. i think i stood there for a few seconds but i believe it was much longer. i remember running into the house to get a camera and when i came out it was gone. in 1977 while in art class we had an assignment to draw a portrait. i drew a face with thin cheeks and larger eyes with a ridge of some type going down from the forehead to where the bridge of a nose would be. there was no nose. when [name removed\cms\tg] (art teacher) saw it he took it and said no very loud and he was angry. mr. [name removed\cms\tg] also lived a few blocks from me on mable street. all my life this has bothered me and of course, i don't really tell anyone because i don't want them to think i'm nuts but i saw something and it wasn't normal; it was not the sun; it was not a plane. i don't know what it was. when i first saw the object i was a little frightened or maybe surprised and then later excited as i went for the camera and finally disappointed when it was gone. i felt sad it was gone. sad as if my best friend moved or something. as an adult, looking back, i feel i lost time but i have no other memory of the event. i've looked on the internet to see if anyone else saw this but i have not been successful.
Summary: Bright yellow/white disk/oval over house, hovering.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Ottumwa
There were no other sightings in Ottumwa on or around May 31st 1974
